item.title: Echoes from the middle ages
item.description: The incredible atmosphere of a place out of time: Erice in Sicily.
The Big apple seen in from an emotional point of view. Shoot with Canon 7d, 17-55 2.8 zoom lens and all handheld.
item.title: Alone in New York

item.description: From the glaciers to the desert, from New Zealand to Rome time flows, flies, burns.
item.title: Time - from New Zealand to Rome

item.description: Grand Canyon, Bryce Canyon, Zion Canyon.
item.title: Journey through Canyons

item.description: Tambakaria, one of the most magical and beautiful places in Chania (Crete), which was known during the 19th century for its tanneries. Many of the old tanneries are today abandoned and ruined, but some are still working...
item.title: Tambakaria

item.description: Shot on the Sony EX3 and Letus Ultimate in Rhyolite, Nevada.
item.title: Rhyolite Ghost Town
